description: The northern beach and slope of Syrup Village where the Black Cat Pirates land their invasion. This previously unknown entrance to the village becomes the site of a major battle when the Straw Hats and Usopp defend against Captain Kuro's crew.

keyEvents.title: Black Cat Pirates Arrive at Northern Coast
keyEvents.description: The Black Cat Pirates' ship arrives at the northern beach, beginning their invasion of Syrup Village from this undefended entrance.
keyEvents.significance: The arrival point for the invasion that the Straw Hats failed to anticipate.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Arrives First at Northern Beach
keyEvents.description: Usopp arrives at the northern slope to face the entire Black Cat Pirates crew with only his young followers as backup.
keyEvents.significance: The beginning of Usopp's heroic stand to defend his village.

keyEvents.title: The Great Battle on the Slope Begins
keyEvents.description: The full-scale battle between the Straw Hat Pirates and the Black Cat Pirates begins on the northern slope.
keyEvents.significance: The main battlefield for the Syrup Village arc's climactic confrontation.

statusHistory.reason: Location becomes the main battlefield for defending Syrup Village

description: The large mansion belonging to the wealthy Kaya and her deceased parents. It sits atop a hill overlooking Syrup Village and becomes a target for Captain Kuro's scheme.

keyEvents.title: Kuro Reveals His True Identity to Merry
keyEvents.description: Inside the mansion, Klahadore drops his butler disguise and reveals himself to Merry as Captain Kuro.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Kuro's deception ends and his villainous plan enters its final phase.

keyEvents.title: Kuro Attacks Merry
keyEvents.description: Kuro attacks Merry with his Cat Claws inside the mansion, leaving the butler severely wounded.
keyEvents.significance: The site of Kuro's return to violence after three years of peaceful deception.
